post.title: 22-24" smart tv's
post.content: hi, i am looking to get a small (22-24") tv with the following functions - does anyone know which models support them -support for smart tv functions (i.e. iplayer) -usb connectivity which supports divx/xvid etc -network connectivity for dlna devices -freeview i know there is the sony 22/24ex320 series, which is quite expensive. any other options? barney
